bug.author: gagandaroach
bug.summary: Bug: Github repo readme says notebooks are in old examples folder.
bug.description:
The Github readme says tutorial notebooks are located in the old examples folder.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25407172/91506442-b1dd5680-e897-11ea-92f0-d47637059dcc.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gagandaroach>@gagandaroach</denchmark-link> , Thanks for your bug report. I submitted PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/pull/968>#968</denchmark-link> to fix it. Thanks.
